name: AnoMalice (Episode 1 shareware)
description:
WhAt Is AnoMalice?

AnoMalice is a 3D surreal First-person puzzle game and shooter hybrid inspired by the upcoming Puzzle platformer Teocida.

Puzzle-FPS mode or "Walking Sim".

If you don't want to play as a shooter, AnoMalice features a Puzzle mode that transforms the game into a free exploration experience with some peculiarities not presented on Standart difficulty modes. No penalties for playing in your favorite mode.

How many episodes will be release?

For the moment this game was upload, there are no plans to expand it. This game was made during my studies with a engine that I still learning the first steps. Maybe It can become a full priced game in the future, but finishing it is not my priority by now.

This 'Episode 1' will be released on Steam?

Hell no! 

Where I can report bugs/Glitches?

You can create an page on AnoMalice's discussion board. but I have to warn you that I'm aware of some missing features like sounds, collisions on "unintended places", etc. Some stuff will be fixed for next releases, if I return to this project of course.

Plus: Only the windows versions were tested.

Where get updates?

You can find me on twitter https://twitter.com/vf_vikintor

I'm going to post news, updates and work in progress there if you don't mind my anti-gamer culture propaganda from time to time.

Controls:

Switch Window to fullscreen - BACKSPACE during the game

Move - WASD

Jump - Space bar

Shot - left mouse button

Spawn entity - right mouse button

Change weapon - 1 - 0 or mouse's scroll whell 

Restart level - +

Pause - ESC

Don't follow AnoMalice rules and you can find something interesting.
